entry.data:
SUNNY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 70S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
PATCHY FOG AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
CALM WINDS

PATCHY FOG IN THE MORNING
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
CALM WINDS, BECOMING NORTH AROUND 5 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
LOWS AROUND 60
